execution_plan.description: Compute the number of order items per product (the frequency each product was ordered) from the orders database.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, COUNT(*) AS order_item_count FROM Order_Items GROUP BY product_id;

execution_plan.description: Retrieve product ids, names and prices for the products referenced in step 1.
execution_plan.query: SELECT product_id, product_name, product_price FROM Products WHERE product_id IN ($step1.product_id);
